content.en: Celebrating genocide by eating turkey with friends and family
eating an entire turkey all on your own.
Enduring your family's racist comments to try and maintain the 'Happy Holidays' vibe.
Stuffing a turkey by making sweet love to its hollowed carcass.
Taking bets with the family on how long before Christmas your sister dumps her Boyfriend of the year.
The Christmas shadow that shows up in early October.
The sense of holiday spirit you feel when buried to the hilt in the cold, uncooked guts of your thanksgiving turkey
For a Thanksgiving meal your family will be talking about all year, try stuffing the turkey with ______.
this year on Black Friday I got an incredible deal on ______.
What did Michael Jackson get 50% off on Black Friday?
